      • setAdapter

        public <H extends QMUISection.Model<H>,T extends QMUISection.Model<T>,VH extends QMUIStickySectionAdapter.ViewHolder> void setAdapter(QMUIStickySectionAdapter<H,T,VH> adapter)
        section header will be sticky when scrolling, see setAdapter(QMUIStickySectionAdapter, boolean)
        类型参数:
        H - generic parameter of QMUIStickySectionAdapter, indicating the section header
        T - generic parameter of QMUIStickySectionAdapter, indicating the section item
        VH - generic parameter of QMUIStickySectionAdapter, indicating the view holder
        参数:
        adapter - the adapter inherited from QMUIStickySectionAdapter

      • setAdapter

        public <H extends QMUISection.Model<H>,T extends QMUISection.Model<T>,VH extends QMUIStickySectionAdapter.ViewHolder> void setAdapter(QMUIStickySectionAdapter<H,T,VH> adapter,
                                                                                                                                      boolean sticky)
        set the adapter for recyclerView, the parameter sticky indicates whether the section header is sticky or not when scrolling.
        类型参数:
        H - generic parameter of QMUIStickySectionAdapter, indicating the section header
        T - generic parameter of QMUIStickySectionAdapter, indicating the section item
        VH - generic parameter of QMUIStickySectionAdapter, indicating the view holder
        参数:
        adapter - the adapter inherited from QMUIStickySectionAdapter
        sticky - if true, make the section header sticky when scrolling
